verses.name: Genesis 43:23
verses.text: And he said, Peace be to you, fear not: your God, and the God of your father, hath given you treasure in your sacks: I had your money. And he brought Simeon out unto them.

verses.name: Genesis 43:24
verses.text: And the man brought the men into Joseph’s house, and gave them water, and they washed their feet; and he gave their asses provender.

verses.name: Genesis 43:25
verses.text: And they made ready the present against Joseph came at noon: for they heard that they should eat bread there.
